\w And|strong="H1272"\w* \w I|strong="H3808"\w* said, \w Should|strong="H4310"\w* \w such|strong="H3644"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* man \w as|strong="H3644"\w* \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w flee|strong="H1272"\w*? \w and|strong="H1272"\w* \w who|strong="H4310"\w* \w is|strong="H4310"\w* there, \w that|strong="H3808"\w*, being \w such|strong="H3644"\w* \w as|strong="H3644"\w* \w I|strong="H3808"\w*, \w would|strong="H4310"\w* go \w into|strong="H1272"\w* \w the|strong="H3808"\w* \w temple|strong="H1964"\w* \w to|strong="H1272"\w* save \w his|strong="H3808"\w* \w life|strong="H2425"\w*? \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H4310"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* go \w in|strong="H3808"\w*.

\w And|strong="H7971"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w discerned|strong="H5234"\w*, \w and|strong="H7971"\w*, \w lo|strong="H2009"\w*, \w God|strong="H3808"\w* \w had|strong="H3588"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*; \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w pronounced|strong="H1696"\w* \w this|strong="H1696"\w* \w prophecy|strong="H5016"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H7971"\w*: \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w Tobiah|strong="H2900"\w* \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w Sanballat|strong="H5571"\w* \w had|strong="H3588"\w* \w hired|strong="H7936"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*.

So \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w wall|strong="H2346"\w* \w was|strong="H3117"\w* \w finished|strong="H7999"\w* \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w and|strong="H6242"\w* \w fifth|strong="H2568"\w* \add day\add* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \add the month\add* Elul, \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w fifty|strong="H2572"\w* \w and|strong="H6242"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*.
